import { useParams, Link, useState, useEffect} from 'react-router-dom'; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem } from "react-bootstrap"; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import axios from "axios"; const ProductScreen = () => { const [product, setProduct] = useState({}); const { id: productId } = useParams(); useEffect(() => { }) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? "In Stock" : "Out of Stock"} ); }; export default ProductScreen;
